name: trello-realtime-assignment
description: Trello Real-time WebSockets + API Frontend Assignment - Complete project with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.test-api: echo 'Import the Postman collection from postman/ directory to test the API'

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ..
